summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 50th Ave. South from Renton Ave. South to South Roxbury Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18789 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
